name: Cruise Ship Vacation Games
overview: Cruise Ship Vacation Games is a collection of 8 mini games that can be played in Career Mode or Free Play. Customize 10 unique characters by unlocking prizes and outfit accessories from three different cruise line locations. The cruise games include: • Trap Shoot: Aim at various target types with the Wii Remote and shoot them down to rack up points. • Shuffle Board: Shuffle pucks down the deck to score points, while attempting to block your opponent from scoring. • Skii Ball: Ramp balls down three unique tracks and score points based on the difficulty and accuracy of the shot. • Ping Pong: Don’t let the ball bounce more than once on your side as you play ping pong against an opponent or a PongBot while using the Wii Remote. • Mini Golf: Try to get the lowest score as you play through three different mini golf courses, each with its own unique theme and course layout. • Driving Range: Hit a bucket of balls at the driving range while either going for distance or landing on targets. • Casino: Place bets at the casino while playing Blackjack, Craps, or Roulette to win some extra cash. • Rock Climbing: Go head to head against an opponent or complete time trials to reach the top of the climbing wall first.
